ygData.subject: Re: Too much EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was playing my enchanter in Oasis.  Some idiot high levels were dragging sand giants and spectres up and down the beach every 5 minutes, so after a
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Nov 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> I think my worst fall asleep episode was while fishing off the dock in
> Quenos waiting for the boat. I woke the next day to find myself naked at
> the front gates. From what I can determine, my hand fell on the keyboard
> and came to rest of the w key that I use for forward movement, so I
> walked off the dock into the water and actually swam a fair way before I
> drowned. :)

I was playing my enchanter in Oasis. Some idiot high levels
were dragging sand giants and spectres up and down the beach
every 5 minutes, so after a particularly nasty fight, I
levitated myself and ran out over the ocean to med/heal up.
I fell asleep, the levitate expired, and I drowned.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
